To deposit cryptocurrency into your Ndax mobile app (web version), follow these steps:

  1. Log in at ndax.io — you’ll be redirected to your dashboard.
  2. Tap the Ndax logo in the top-left corner.
  3. From the dropdown menu, select Wallet.
  4. Choose the cryptocurrency you wish to deposit from the asset list.
  5. Tap Receive.
  6. Select the network that matches your sending wallet.
  7. Your Ndax wallet address and, if required, a destination tag or memo will be displayed.

⚠️ Important: If a destination tag or memo is shown, it must be included when sending your crypto.
Omitting this information may prevent your deposit from reaching your account and can result in processing delays.

8. Copy the wallet address and tag/memo (if applicable), then paste them into your external wallet to complete the transfer.
